entries.npc_reset_2: If you want to finish up later come back and see me.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Go kill the Rebel supply sergeant and take the hyperdrive part.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Go pick up the item from the smuggler
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Return to Gravin Attal with the hyperdrive part.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Return to Gravin Attal with the disc
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_3_2: You want me to give crates of Imperial blaster rifles to the Rebels? Are you out of your mind?
entries.player_3_1: What do you want me to pick up?
entries.npc_work_2: What are you waiting for, pal?
entries.npc_work_1: You picked up my package yet? I need that merchandise.
entries.npc_smuggle_1: I'm glad to get this thing off my hands. Be careful it doesn't burn you.
entries.npc_reward_2: Great work, pal! We make quite a team. You keep killing Rebels and I'll keep selling off their stuff and together we'll bring peace and prosperity to the galaxy.
entries.npc_reward_1: Great, I've already got a buyer waiting for this.
entries.npc_reset_1: If you want to finish up later come back and see me.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Let me find out where you're supposed to turn that Rebel into a grease spot -- I mean make the trade. Come see me in a few minutes.
entries.npc_noloc_1: You'd think these people would call and tell you where they want to make the drop, but no. I have to do everything myself.
entries.npc_failure_2: Pal, you're breaking my heart here.  No part? How am I supposed to put my kid through the Academy now?
entries.npc_failure_1: Too much for you, huh? This is going to cost me a fortune.
entries.npc_breech_1: You weren't followed were you? Not that I'm impugning your skills.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Are you waiting for something or was there something you needed to tell me?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: I've got a business to run as well as my actual job to do, make it snappy.
entries.npc_4_2: Don't be such a chump. This is just business and I want that part. I can sell that part for a tidy sum and help put my kid through the Academy -- if I ever have one. Besides, it's not as though I'm actually going to give up the blaster rifles. That's where you come in. How about it?
entries.npc_4_1: Hey, slow down, pal. You ask an awful lot of questions that don't concern you. I just need someone to pick up a little something that got lost -- from the supply roster. No big deal. What do you say?
entries.npc_3_2: That's okay. Just keep me in mind when you want to do business.
entries.npc_3_1: No problem, pal. You need something later? You come see me.
entries.npc_2_2: Great. You go and meet this Rebel and remove the part from the smoldering corpse -- being careful not to damage the part of course. You get the glory of being the great Rebel slayer and I get the proceeds from selling that hyperdrive part. It's win-win.
entries.npc_2_1: Down to business then. I want you to meet a
that picked up an item that fell off the Imperial supply roster. Don't worry about what it is, pal, just bring it back here.
entries.npc_1_2: I love it when work and business come together in harmony. Through a smuggler intermediary I've been able to convince some Rebel supply officer that I'm willing to trade a few crates of Imperial blaster rifles for a hyperdrive part that I need. Would you mind making the trade for me?
entries.npc_1_1: Are you here to pick up the AT-ST? No, wait -- that's tomorrow. What do you need? I can get you anything you want: blasters, thermal detonators, anti-orbital ion cannons, you name it. You don't look like you could scrape the creds together for that last one, though. But what I need is someone to do a pickup for me. Are you looking for work?
entries.notyet: I don't need anything right now.
entries.notit_2: This isn't a hyperdrive part. Come on pal, look again.
entries.next: I have to cool it for a while an Imperial Inspector looks around. Maybe I'll have something for you later.
entries.dontknowyou_2: You should clear out of here friend. You never know when trouble may start.
entries.dontknowyou_1: What are you looking at me for? I'm not doing anything.
entries.cant_work: You come see me about some work when you have some time to kill.
